about_the_game:
Play as a regular worker. After work, you are heading home, but you fell asleep in metro and when you wake up you find yourself in an empty small town. You are faced with a demonic monster and have to find a way to escape this little town and go home safely.

Features:

  • Ominous atmosphere

  • Hard to predict jump scares

  • Unpredictable Enemy AI

Short heart pounding playtime

WASD for movement
"C" for Camera
CTRL for crouching

content_descriptors.notes: There's a blood in the game

detailed_description:
Play as a regular worker. After work, you are heading home, but you fell asleep in metro and when you wake up you find yourself in an empty small town. You are faced with a demonic monster and have to find a way to escape this little town and go home safely.

Features:

  • Ominous atmosphere

  • Hard to predict jump scares

  • Unpredictable Enemy AI

Short heart pounding playtime

WASD for movement
"C" for Camera
CTRL for crouching
name: Book Head Monster

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 770 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

short_description: Book Head Monster is a survival horror game. You find yourself in an empty metro station after falling asleep after long days of work. Find the key to the car and get to home safely from Head Book Monster!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
